newsitem.title: UK: LME to vote on board changes on March 17.
newsitem.headline: LME to vote on board changes on March 17.

text.p: The London Metal Exchange will hold an extraordinary general meeting on March 17 to vote on proposed changes to its articles of association, the LME said in a notice.
LME members will vote on whether to change the structure of the board, a LME spokesman said, without giving details of the proposed changes.
Industry sources have said the proposals would shift the balance of power and give more emphasis to non-ring directorship.
